narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
Inspection and exit interview conducted with facility representative. Recordkeeping requirements were discussed
with the applicant.
Note: The applicant has met the licensing requirements and wishes to be licensed as a class C exhibitor. A check
for the licensing fee must be mailed to:
USDA APHIS Animal Care
920 Main Campus Drive Suite 200
Raleigh, NC 27606-5213
NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES ALLOWED UNTIL A LICENSE IS OBTAINED.
End of report.
